articles.title: Joint statement released in Jordan on anniversary of DPRK
Japan's moves to tighten military alliance with U.S. denounced
Remains of over 500 persons entombed in Patriotic Martyrs' Cemetery
Silkworm stimulant developed
U.S. and Japanese reactionaries' talk about "threat from N. Korea" refuted
KEDO delegation arrives
articles.content:
KEDO delegation arrives 
    Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA)-- A KEDO delegation arrived here today by air to participate in the high-level DPRK-KEDO negotiation for the implementation of the agreement on the provision of light water reactors.

articles.title: Mongolian Foreign Ministry delegation here
articles.content:
Mongolian Foreign Ministry delegation here 
    Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian Foreign Ministry delegation headed by State Secretary Ganbold Baasanjav arrived here today by air.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from new Russian ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from new Russian ambassador 
    Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from newly appointed Russian ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present was vice-minister of foreign affairs Kung Sok Ung.    
 After receiving the credentials, the president talked with the ambassador.

articles.title: Kim Il Chol meets friendship visiting group of CPLA
articles.content:
Kim Il Chol meets friendship visiting group of CPLA
    Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and conversed with a friendship visiting group of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA) headed by lt. General Wu Yuqian, deputy commander of the Shenyang military command area of the CPLA, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were generals and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
